identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a tactical, high-density cybersecurity dashboard that feels like a 'God Mode' command center. Avoid generic SaaS aesthetics.

theme.visual_style: Obsidian backgrounds, Neon data points, Glass overlays, Scanlines

headings.usage: All headers, data values, and KPIs

layout.container_style: Glassmorphic cards with 1px subtle borders and backdrop blur
rules: Widgets must stretch to fill height (h-full)
No jagged bottoms in grid layouts

components.customization: Heavily customized for dark mode. Remove rounded corners (use rounded-sm or rounded-none for tactical feel). Add glowing borders on active states.

visual_enhancers.scanlines: Overlay with repeating-linear-gradient for retro-tech feel (optional)
visual_enhancers.motion: Subtle pulses for live data. Smooth transitions (0.2s ease-out) for hover states.

image_urls.map_placeholder: Use CSS/SVG or a library like react-simple-maps. Do not use a static image.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL TAILWIND CSS: The project is missing Tailwind. Run 'npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer' and 'npx tailwindcss init -p'. Configure 'tailwind.config.js' to include content paths: ['./index.html', './src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}']. Add directives to 'src/index.css'.
2. INSTALL SHADCN/UI: Run 'npx shadcn@latest init'. Choose 'New York' style, 'Zinc' base color, and 'yes' for CSS variables. Then install required components.
3. CONFIGURE FONTS: Import 'JetBrains Mono' and 'Inter' from Google Fonts in 'index.css'. Update 'tailwind.config.js' to use them.
4. IMPLEMENT THEME: Force dark mode in 'index.html' (add class='dark'). Set background to #050505.
5. BUILD LAYOUT: Create the Dashboard using the Bento Grid strategy. Use 'recharts' for data visualization (already installed).
6. MOCK DATA: Create a 'mockData.js' file to simulate real-time threats if backend is not ready.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable, but keep data dense in the dashboard.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays separate good from extraordinary.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
